faq_responses.hours: We are open Monday-Friday 9AM-6PM, Saturday 10AM-4PM. Closed Sundays.
faq_responses.location: We're located at 123 Main Street, Downtown. Free parking available.
faq_responses.services: We offer haircuts, styling, coloring, treatments, and special event styling.
faq_responses.prices: Haircuts start at $30, styling from $25, coloring from $60. Call for detailed pricing.
faq_responses.cancellation: Please give us 24 hours notice for cancellations to avoid fees.
faq_responses.walk-ins: We accept walk-ins but recommend booking ahead to guarantee your preferred time.
faq_responses.payment: We accept cash, credit cards, and digital payments (Venmo, PayPal, etc.).
faq_responses.first-time: First-time clients get 10% off! Please arrive 15 minutes early for consultation.
faq_responses.parking: Free parking is available in the lot behind our building.
faq_responses.staff: Our experienced stylists are licensed professionals with 5+ years experience.
faq_responses.products: We use premium salon products including Redken, Matrix, and Paul Mitchell.

automated_responses.greeting: Hello! Welcome to {business_name}. I'm your virtual assistant. How can I help you today?
automated_responses.booking_success: ✅ Your appointment is confirmed! We'll send you a reminder 24 hours before your appointment.
automated_responses.booking_cancelled: No problem! Your appointment was not booked. Feel free to start over anytime.
automated_responses.outside_hours: Thank you for contacting us! We're currently closed but will respond during business hours.
automated_responses.error: I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Could you please rephrase your request?
